name: Train Wreck
description:
Train Wreck

Autumn 2022

Game Made for the first edition of the LaSalle Cloning Club under the theme "Snake".

~15 hours of production over 5 weeks.

_____________________________________________

Game Context

Your train is the only thing between you and them.

They are relentless, they are infinite, and your only option to survive is to wreck them up with the sheer force of the locomotive you drive.

_____________________________________________

Gameplay

Mouse & Keyboard

  • A & D: Rotate the locomotive

Gamepad (D-Pad & left stick)

  • Left & Right: Rotate the locomotive

_____________________________________________

Credits

All sprites were made by the owner of the game

Imported Sound

  • RAME, Epoc of war, https://freesound.org/people/RokZRooM/sounds/579313/
  • Unknown, Metal hit sound, Unkown
  • All other sounds were made by the owner of the game using the Chiptone app: https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone
